transArray.content: The hotel is very close to Wanda Plaza, and there are many creative parks around it. It is only 100 meters away from the free nucleic acid testing point. It is very convenient to take a taxi from here to Universal Studios for only 30 yuan. There are also few cars around and itâ€™s very quiet.
Dear guest, thank you very much for choosing. Summer has the late glow. Just like the little guy who comes late, everyone is smiling. I love you, little guy.
